attributes.action: Petrol under £1 litre or Stop Road Tax
attributes.additional_details: To save the economy and help millions the government needs to look at either bringing fuel down to around the £1 per litre mark or below and if that not viable then cut the road tax licence. But surely it is more important to keep the licence as you then have control over who has cars legally on the road. The cost of fuel is pushing everything higher and the cost of living is not meeting it. Please help your country.
